input_text:
Job Title: HYBRID - Personal Lines Customer Service Representative

Location: Greater San Luis Obispo Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Customer Service, General Business

Description:
HYBRID - Personal Lines Customer Service Representative - San Luis Obispo, CA area
Do you have exceptional organizational skills and take pride in giving clients a great experience? Our top insurance company has an incredible opportunity available. With over 50 years of experience in this industry, they truly value the services it provides to its clients. The passion for what they do speaks for itself and they want to add a strong leader to their team. This position is located in the San Luis Obispo, CA area and is a hybrid schedule. If this sounds like it will be a great fit for you, apply now! 
PerksFlexible and balanced work scheduleFull time, in officeBenefits: medical, dental, vision401kPaid time off$20.00 - $28.00/hr
 What we need from you:Experience - You have 1-3+ years of customer service representative and/or insurance experience working in an insurance officeLicensed - You have your active Property & Casualty licenseSoftware - You have experience working with various agency management systems - AppliedEpic, AMS360, Microsoft Office, Outlook, carrier websites, and other software systems as needed for the positionComprehensive knowledge - You have strong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills along with organizational skills.
Responsibilities:Build client relationships by creating a positive environment and providing a high level of trust and professionalism Processing certificates, notice of cancellations, and change requests/endorsementsRequests for information and documentationPrepare the applications for submission with underwriting information provided by the producerFollow up with Markets for quotations

APPLY NOW!Why Insurance Relief™?As a businessperson in the insurance industry, it is an advantage to partner with a staffing expert and ally who understands your unique skills and needs. With vast experience in the insurance arena, Insurance Relief™ works with brokers, carriers, and third-party administrators to locate and place the best people for positions ranging from entry-level to senior management. We invest the time to truly understand what you want to accomplish and then do our best to find meaningful opportunities.Insurance Relief™ provides ample opportunities for you to put your skills to work so if this position is not quite the fit for you please give us a call to hear about all of the other opportunities we have available.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: HYBRID - Personal Lines Customer Service Representative
output_json.summary: Exceptional organizational skills and client experience required for a top insurance company's team in the San Luis Obispo, CA area.
soft_skills: Strong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
job_responsibilities: Process certificates, notice of cancellations, and change requests/endorsements
Follow up with Markets for quotations
output_json.company_information: Insurance Relief™ specializes in placing skilled individuals in the insurance industry, offering opportunities from entry-level to senior management.
